sentences.sContent: Due to the harsh environment, at least one person in each household suffers from diseases like rheumatism, stomach complaint and gynecological disease.
sentences.sContent_eng: Due to the harsh environment, at least one person in each household suffers from diseases like rheumatism, stomach complaint and gynecological disease.
sentences.sCn: 恶劣的生活环境导致了每个家庭都有成员存在不同程度的疾病。 风湿病、胃病、妇科病常伴着他们。

sentences.sContent: Arsenic was also widely available at the time, handed out in the form of Fowler's Solution as a treatment for everything from rheumatism – something Austen complained of in her letters – to syphilis.
sentences.sContent_eng: Arsenic was also widely available at the time, handed out in the form of Fowler's Solution as a treatment for everything from rheumatism – something Austen complained of in her letters – to syphilis.
sentences.sCn: 砷在当时以福勒氏溶液（亚砷酸钾溶液）的形式被广泛使用：该溶液被作为一种医治百病的药剂——从风湿病到梅毒——奥斯汀在信中曾抱怨过此事。

words.tran: 风湿病的；风湿病引起的

trans.tranOther: a disease that makes your joints or muscles painful and stiff
